info.name: Facebook Dislike Button
info.description: The angry reaction is pretty much showing disapproval of a post on Facebook, so it may as well be a dislike button c: You're welcome!
info.additionalInfo:
[v1.5] - May 19th 2017

Dislike button fixed. Completely reworked CSS.

[v1.4] - June 30th 2016

Dislike button fixed

[Note] - April 20th 2016

Facebook flipped the dislike button D:

[v1.3] - Mar 19th 2016

Rebuilt due to Facebook updates. Sorry for the delay! Completely changed CSS. Now the reason behind my delay: I had to go low-profile in a way. Facebook changed how the "reactions" worked shortly after I released the language update and when I had a look they sort of made everything a lot harder to select (refer to) in CSS. Count this update lucky, they made 1 mistake that nearly made this Style lose many features. Until then, enjoy :)

[v1.2] - Mar 6th 2016

Fixes & Multilanguage support, Translated by Bing :)

[v1.1] - Feb 27th 2016

Fixes and improvements

[v1.0] - Feb 26th 2016

Released

data.title: I disliked something but icon isn't changed from 'like'

options.label: French
options.value: .UFILinkBright[style~="rgb(247,"]:before {content: "N'aimait pas";} div[data-reaction="8"] div div div:after {content:"N'aime pas";font-size:12px;}

options.label: Spanish
options.value: .UFILinkBright[style~="rgb(247,"]:before {content: "No le gustaba";} div[data-reaction="8"] div div div:after {content:"No les gusta";font-size:12px;}

options.label: German
options.value: .UFILinkBright[style~="rgb(247,"]:before {content: "Abneigung gegen";} div[data-reaction="8"] div div div:after {content:"Nicht mögen";font-size:12px;}

options.label: Polish
options.value: .UFILinkBright[style~="rgb(247,"]:before {content: "Nie lubił";} div[data-reaction="8"] div div div:after {content:"Nie lubię";font-size:12px;}
